Aug. 6, 1912 D South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association (A Section)
South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association (A Section) 10 Test Piece Contest South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association south-wales-monmouthshire-brass-band-association-a
Wagners Works
Public Park, Blaina, Monmouthshire Prizes - 1st £15 and cup, 2nd £10, 3rd £5 , 4th £3. 22nd Annual Contest. 5 bands competed
